Address: 505 THIRD AVE E, ONEONTA, Alabama, 35121, United States of America
CompanyDescription: We were formed as a Delaware limited liability company in 1998 for the purpose of operating and acquiring rural local exchange carriers ("RLECs"). Since 1999, we have acquired eleven RLEC businesses, four of which serve contiguous territories in north central Alabama; three of which serve territories adjacent to either Portland or Bangor, Maine; and one each serving a portion of western Massachusetts, central Missouri, western Vermont and southern West Virginia. In addition to traditional telephone services, we provide a variety of unregulated telecommunications services in all of our RLEC territories, including internet data lines and long distance services. We have also acquired three facilities-based competitive local exchange carriers ("CLECs"), which offer services primarily to business and enterprise customers in Maine, New Hampshire and Massachusetts, and have historically operated under the trade name OTT Communications.  ...
